Description: Fragment of oval handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with herm symbol.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '52'. Name Rhodon. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, CEALEX MAR223.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (235)
